text: Daniel Peter "Danny" Masterson (born March 13, 1976) is an American former actor. He is known for his role as Steven Hyde in That '70s Show. On June 17, 2020, Masterson was charged with raping a 23-year-old woman in 2001, a 28-year-old woman in early 2003 and a 23-year-old woman in late 2003. The three counts come after a three-year investigation beginning in 2017. On September 7, 2023, Masterson was convicted on two of three counts of rape and was sentenced to 30 years to life in prison. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American criminals Category:American movie actors Category:American rapists Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:Scientologists
title: Danny Masterson
